settings.title: Entry-Level Package
settings.description:
Everything you need to kickstart your APS journey, including:

✅ Introduction APS Masterclass – Gain an insider’s perspective on the APS, including its structure, benefits, and opportunities.

✅ Eligibility and Qualifications Guide – Learn the citizenship, security, and skill requirements to get started.

✅ APS 1-4 Cover Letter & Resume – Professionally tailored documents to help you land your first public service role.

✅ APS Application Process Guide – Navigate the application process with ease using step-by-step instructions.

✅ First Day in the APS Guide – Prepare for success with insights into workplace culture and expectations.


🎁 BONUS: APS Values & Code of Conduct Module – Familiarize yourself with ethical standards for a head start.


💡 Earning Potential: Unlock $50k–$80k/year with your first APS job!

settings.title: Career Growth Package
settings.description:
Everything in the Entry-Level APS Package, plus advanced tools to climb the ranks, including:

✅ 20-Minute Career Coaching Session – Get one-on-one guidance to map your goals and receive actionable advice.

✅ APS 5-6 Cover Letter & Resume – Tailored application documents emphasizing your leadership and technical expertise.

✅ Interview Preparation Guide for APS Roles – Sharpen your skills for behavioral and technical interviews.

✅ 30-Day Interview Guarantee – Land an interview or receive ongoing support until you succeed.


💡 Earning Potential: Position yourself for $80k–$100k/year in mid-level APS roles!

settings.title: Leadership Package
settings.description:
Everything in the Career Growth APS Package, plus premium resources to lead the APS sector, including:

✅ 60-Minute Executive Career Coaching Session – Deep-dive session to develop leadership skills and create a custom action plan.

✅ Custom Executive-Level Cover Letter & Resume – Highlight your vision and strategic contributions.

✅ LinkedIn Profile Optimization for Executives – Build a compelling profile to attract APS recruiters.

✅ Advanced Interview Preparation Guide – Ace complex policy and leadership interview questions with confidence.

✅ Professional Networking Strategies for Government – Build meaningful connections with senior officials and stakeholders.

✅ EL/SES Cover Letter & Resume – Documents tailored for Executive Level and Senior Executive Service roles.

✅ 90-Day Interview Guarantee – If you don’t land interviews for senior roles, we’ll continue working with you until you succeed.

✅ Priority Support & Unlimited Revisions – Enjoy expedited service and unlimited updates to your documents.


💡 Earning Potential: Command $100k–$250k+ in APS leadership roles!
